titleStmt.title: Munday the 29th. January, 1648 A true relation of the Kings speech to the Lady Elizabeth, and the Duke of Gloucester, the day before his death.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Elizabeth, Princess of England, 1635-1650.

notesStmt.note: Includes: Another relation from the Lady Elizabeths own hand.
